EmailTemplate.name: Results of Parent Survey 2012-2013
EmailTemplate.subject: Results of Parent Survey 2012-2013
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The British School of Tashkent Part of The British Schools Group
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Further to the survey we conducted at the end of the last academic year I’m happy to attach a presentation of the results and a letter from the Foundation Chairman. Kind regards,
В приложении вы можете найти результаты опроса родителей, который был проведен в конце прошлого учебного года, а также письмо от председателя Фонда Британских школ.
Regards,
Administration Team The British School of Tashkent World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ Beijing - Kuala Lumpur - Sao Paulo - Manila - Moscow - Guangzhou - Nanjing - Tashkent - Pamplona -Marbella
